Project Categories

Explore our diverse portfolio of innovative solutions

Racket PAM CMake Clang

Voix - Sudo Replacement

Modern privilege escalation tool written in Racket that replaces sudo/doas with enhanced security, cleaner configuration, and improved developer experience. Features PAM integration, authentication caching, JSON logging, and comprehensive security hardening. Ready for AUR release.

Active v0.0.25b
Dart Flutter Lua C++

Meshiji - File Explorer

Flutter-based file explorer application designed for Linux. Features plugin system with Lua support, search capabilities, directory size caching, trash management, and performance optimizations. Cross-platform ambitions with current focus on Linux stabilization.

Beta v0.0.20b
C++ CEF Elixir EFL Racket

Vaelix - Die Siebenfunken

High-modern, modular browser architecture embracing speed, custom UI, and extensibility. Built with C++/CEF, Elixir, EFL, and Racket. Features GPU-accelerated UI, zero-copy rendering, seven-ring aesthetic design, and plugin system. Currently in infrastructure phase with 400-600 hours remaining implementation.

Infrastructure Phase v0.0.2
Lua Vaesktöng JSON

Peguni Draem'la

A game made out of sheer boredom by Dae. Text-based virtual pet simulator featuring the constructed language Vaesktöng. Create bonds with your digital companion through interactive care, exploration, and personalized adventures.

Active 2025
C CachyOS EEVDF ThinLTO Madvsie

Aura-Core Kernel

Rebuild of CachyOS EEVDF kernel with ThinLTO optimization and Madvsie for Transparent Huge Pages management. Performance-focused Linux kernel variant with enhanced Alder Lake processor optimization.

Active 2025
C Fedora Red Hat Alder Lake

Vaeril - Custom Fedora Kernel

Dae's custom Fedora kernel files including Red Hat patches. Optimized for Alder Lake processors with performance enhancements and custom configurations.

Active 2025
Jekyll HTML CSS JavaScript Anime.js

Veridian Zenith Website

Mystical minimalism approach to digital presence, blending Nordic aesthetics with futuristic design. Built with Jekyll, features golden particle systems, clean Unicode symbols, responsive design, and comprehensive anime.js animations.

Live 2025
